App.Title: uknit
App.Author: Nithin Shenoy
App.Description: Stitch counter and other knitting tools
App.AdditionalNotes: Thank you for trying out uknit! If you have any suggestions, bugs, or feedback, please feel free to drop me a line.

Items.Item:
1.3 Fixed crashing bug related to Live Tiles
1.2 Added Live Tile support for row counters
1.1 Fixed accuracy of ruler
1.0 Initial public release
Source Code All source code for uknit is available at https://github.com/nshenoy/uknit under the GPL v3 license. Feel free to contribute.

Background Images All background images were original works by my lovely wife Kerry. Follow her on Ravelry at http://www.ravelry.com/people/KerryBeth.
Libraries This app would not have been possible without these great components: - http://ylad.codeplex.com. - http://coding4fun.codeplex.com/ - http://nuget.org/packages/MetroGridHelper - http://imagetools.codeplex.com
